org.apache.hive.hcatalog.templeton.tool

Class ZooKeeperStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.templeton.tool.ZooKeeperStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TempletonStorage

    public class ZooKeeperStorage
extends Object
implements TempletonStorage
    A storage implementation based on storing everything in ZooKeeper. This keeps everything in a central location that is guaranteed to be available and accessible. Data is stored with each key/value pair being a node in ZooKeeper.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.hive.hcatalog.templeton.tool.TempletonStorage

                       String id,
                       String key)
        Description copied from interface: TempletonStorage

               throws NotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: TempletonStorage

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
